message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $11,500.  It's a great deal and I'm confident you'll find it very valuable.  Let me know what you think!
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your product's value, but I'm hoping to keep my spending within $10,000. Would it be possible for us to negotiate down to $10,000?
Bob, I understand your budget, but $10,000 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $10,500 to make this work for both of us.  What do you think?
